titles.title: Safe Helicopters Now Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a credit against tax for improving the safety of fuel systems in emergency medical rotorcraft.
Safe Helicopters Now Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Safe Helicopters Now Act
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit equal to 10% of the costs of making changes to a fuel system in an emergency medical rotorcraft to comply with certain requirements for fuel system crash resistance.
